Html:
Hi Guys

Has anyone tried to use this with CodeIgniter? If so, can you please suggest how to configure is right?

$autoload['libraries'] = array('database','PHPLinq');

is in my autoload.php

Thanks

Could tell me where do you get this PHPLinq library? I tried to look all over the CI site and haven't found anywhere.

The way you wrote their is right, although private libraries could cause some problem. It means that the autoload, if I am no mistaken, search for keyword outside the application folder, except with plugins. But you should look at the user_guide to make this sure.
